entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as the location where Harry and Mr. Weasley are present.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a main character in the story, following Mr. Weasley through the gates into the smaller hall beyond.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is accompanying Harry and is recognized by another wizard, Bob.

entities.name: bob
entities.description: Bob is a bearded wizard who is holding a cardboard box that is emitting rasping noises.

entities.name: the ban on experimental breeding
entities.description: The Ban on Experimental Breeding is mentioned as being breached by the mysterious object in the cardboard box.

relationships.description: Harry and Mr. Weasley are together, following the crowd into the smaller hall beyond.
The mysterious object in Bob's cardboard box is a serious breach of The Ban on Experimental Breeding.
